name: Can - পারা / পারি।
example:
1. I can run fast. 
 2. He can carry 50kg weight. 
 3. She can cook beef curry.

name: Could - পারতাম।
example:
1. It could be us. 
 2. They could help us if they want. 
 3. She could help you.

name: Will be able to - পারব।
example:
1. I will be able to learn english. 
 2. He wil be able to drive car. 
 3. They will be able to win against Opponent team.

name: May / Might - হয়তো পারি।
example:
1. It may rain today. 
 2. You might go there. 
 3. You may come to the classroom.

name: Have to / Has to - তেই হবে।
Am/is/are to + about to - প্রায় যাচ্ছে।
